en.title: Foods That Are Toxic to Cats: A Complete List of Dangerous Items
en.content:
Some foods that are perfectly safe for humans can cause poisoning in cats. Knowing what to avoid is essential for your cat's safety.

Foods You Must Never Give Your Cat

FoodDanger
Allium vegetables (onions, leeks, chives, etc.)Destroys red blood cells, causing anemia
Chocolate and cocoaTheobromine poisoning (affects the heart and nervous system)
Grapes and raisinsCan cause kidney failure
AlcoholToxic even in small amounts
XylitolCauses hypoglycemia and liver damage
CaffeineAffects the heart and nervous system
Raw seafood (squid, shrimp, etc.)Thiaminase causes vitamin B1 deficiency
Lily family plantsKidney failure (flowers, pollen, and leaves are all toxic)

What to Do If Your Cat Ingests Something Toxic

Contact your veterinarian immediately. Be ready to tell them what your cat ate, how much, and when it was consumed. Do not attempt to induce vomiting on your own.

zh.title: 猫咪禁食食物清单：危险食品及中毒症状
zh.content:
有些食物对人类安全，但对猫咪来说却可能引起中毒。了解这些食物非常重要。

绝对不能给猫吃的食物

食品危险性
葱蒜类（洋葱、大葱、韭菜等）破坏红细胞，导致贫血
巧克力·可可可可碱中毒（影响心脏和神经系统）
葡萄·葡萄干可导致肾衰竭
酒精即使少量也会中毒
木糖醇导致低血糖和肝损伤
咖啡因影响心脏和神经系统
生海鲜（鱿鱼、虾等）硫胺素酶导致维生素B1缺乏
百合科植物导致肾衰竭（花朵、花粉、叶子均有毒）

误食后的处理方法

请立即联系动物医院。告知兽医猫咪吃了什么、吃了多少以及什么时候吃的。不要自行尝试催吐。
